CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 17 reads: "3. Max Sigal of the Oakland Furniture Company congratulates Mrs. Elizabeth Scott, 709 Watt Lane, upon winning the Westinghouse Electric Range, one of the grand prizes at the fair"
TitMainTitle: Max Sigal of the Oakland Furniture Company congratulating Elizabeth Scott on winning Westinghouse stove at the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Syria Mosque
